## Path.isEqual() method

Returns true if `path1` and `path2` refer to the same underlying path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static isEqual(path1: string, path2: string): boolean;
```

**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

The comparison is performed using `path.relative()`<></>.
